head.title: Rachel & Edgar Wedding | Dana Marino Design
head.description: A Curacao custom map Save the Date and illustrated wedding invitations for Rachel and Edgar's tropical destination wedding.

body.name: Rachel & Edgar
body.description: A Curacao custom map Save the Date and illustrated wedding invitations for Rachel and Edgar's tropical destination wedding. We used a custom logo throughout the suite featuring the Brazilian and American flags — united by the Curacao flag — to signify the blending of the couple's families. In consideration of their guests, all pieces were created in English and in Portuguese.
